page.title: 05MONYASH AND FLAGG SCHOOLS
page.content: {Monyash C.E (Cont.) Primary School}was built in 1871.There are only two classrooms with 46 children from Monyash and Flagg.The school is very crowded.At 11 years of age the children go to{Lady Manners School}in Bakewell. The school has a headmaster,a full- time and a part-time teacher,a caretaker,a canteen-assistant,a mid_day supervisor and a clerical assistant.There is a{Parent Teacher {Association}which raises funds for the school and organises social functions. { Flagg School}is now a Nursery School for 3 to 4 year olds.There is a headteacher and a nursery nurse with students helping part-time.The children attend either the morning or afternoon sessions.Almost all local parents now send their children to the Nursery School.
